definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: You may have to do a little self-promotion, but try not to come off as a braggart.
sentences.chinese: 你可以做点自我推销，但是不要过了头成了牛皮专家。
牛皮鞋底自然灯芯水分。

sentences.english: Seeing the tent and yak skin boat they know that the three men are in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 看见湖边的帐篷和牛皮船知道他们有事就过来了。

sentences.english: He is always boasting, so no one trusts him.
sentences.chinese: 他总是吹牛皮，没人相信他。

sentences.english: Material selection for imported cowhide, sheepskin, such as crocodile skin.
sentences.chinese: 制作材料精选为进口牛皮，羊皮，鳄鱼皮等。

sentences.english: Vellum preserves photographs on scrapbook pages.
sentences.chinese: 牛皮纸上保留了照片的剪贴簿页面。

sentences.english: Wheatgrass helps with skin problems such as eczema or psoriasis.
sentences.chinese: 麦草有助于改善皮肤问题，例如湿疹或牛皮癣。

sentences.english: In India, the beef and leather prodution are prohibited.
sentences.chinese: 印度教忌食牛肉和使用牛皮制品。

sentences.english: The book cover is made of fine calfskin leather.
sentences.chinese: 书的封面用精致的小牛皮制成。

sentences.english: I bought a dictionary and wrapped it up in brown paper.
sentences.chinese: 我买了本字典，并把它包在了牛皮纸里。

sentences.english: So, patients with psoriasis can eat raw soya-bean milk?
sentences.chinese: 那么，牛皮癣患者可以生食豆浆吗？

sentences.english: The unique blended-color leather makes this bag looks simple but not dull.
sentences.chinese: 独有的深浅棕混色牛皮，让包包看起来简约却不单调。

sentences.english: Suffer from a skin condition like eczema or psoriasis?
sentences.chinese: 患有类似湿疹或牛皮癣吗？

sentences.english: There are a lot of is born soya-bean milk to patients with psoriasis.
sentences.chinese: 生豆浆中有很多是不利于牛皮癣患者的。

sentences.english: Made of silver calfskin, its flap shines with Silver Shade Crystal Mesh.
sentences.chinese: 做银色小牛皮，它的挡水板发光与银色树荫水晶滤网。

sentences.english: Soft leather uppers are breathable and mold to your feet.
sentences.chinese: 软牛皮鞋面的透气性和你的脚模。

definition: outer skin/surface/leather cover (of a book)/drum skin/leather upper (of a shoe)
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
